scripts.deploy:dev: gcloud functions deploy hello-world --entry-point cloudFunction --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --project projectName --gen2 --region us-central1 --set-secrets 'CONFIG=projects:latest' --set-env-vars TZ='America/Los_Angeles'
scripts.deploy:prod: gcloud functions deploy hello-world --entry-point cloudFunction --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --project projectName --gen2 --region us-central1 --set-secrets 'CONFIG=projects:latest' --set-env-vars TZ='America/Los_Angeles'
